GameItemType.Description: The Horse part of the Centaur body. This base is used by Centaurs and provides a way to alter the visual appearance of Centaur heroes. It cannot be used by anyone else, and is a visual upgrade only.

GameModifier.Provides: ::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies

GameItemType.Description: Umberdroths are slower than other mounts, but provide excellent protection and superior weight capacity.

GameModifier.Provides: Umberdroths are slower than other mounts, but provide excellent protection and superior weight capacity.

GameItemType.Description: Demonhounds are immensely strong beasts that are natively resistant to magic. They are bred alongside the warriors they will eventually carry, and cannot be purchased for heroes to ride.

GameModifier.Provides: Demonhounds are immensely strong beasts that are natively resistant to magic. They are bred alongside the warriors they will eventually carry, and cannot be purchased for heroes to ride.
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies
::: Can't be bought in the shop

GameItemType.Description: Dire Bears, albeit slow, are vicious in battle. Their thick fur almost completely protects the rider from arrows.

GameModifier.Provides: Dire Bears, albeit slow, are vicious in battle. Their thick fur almost completely protects the rider from arrows.

GameItemType.Description: Icebeasts are vaguely transparent beings of ice capable of vicious assaults. They flow naturally with the movements of their rider.

GameModifier.Provides: Icebeasts are vaguely transparent beings of ice capable of vicious assaults. They flow naturally with the movements of their rider.
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies
::: Backswing ::: ::: 20% Chance ::: On missed swing, backswings ::: Not applicable IF using an axe

GameItemType.Description: Death Slags have incredibly tough skin, and are native to swamps. Any army with a unit of Mire slag riders can pass through swamps using 1 move instead of 2.

GameModifier.Provides: Death Slags have incredibly tough skin, and are native to swamps. Any army with a unit of Mire slag riders can pass through swamps using 1 move instead of 2.
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies

GameItemType.Description: Deer are quick and agile, but are not capable of carrying anything beyond their rider.

GameModifier.Provides: Deer are quick and agile, but are not capable of carrying anything beyond their rider.

GameItemType.Description: Deer are quick and agile, but are not capable of carrying anything beyond their rider.

GameItemType.Description: Dark Skaths tend to be born in areas where great battles have been fought. Not necessarily feeding on the dead, they are still somehow a result of the death around them.

GameModifier.Provides: Dark Skaths tend to be born in areas where great battles have been fought. Not necessarily feeding on the dead, they are still somehow a result of the death around them.
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies

GameItemType.Description: Far too poisonous for anyone else to ride, the Undead ride these beasts in battle. These mounts may not be purchased for or used for any non-Undead Champion.

GameModifier.Provides: Far too poisonous for anyone else to ride, the Undead ride these beasts in battle. These mounts may not be purchased for or used for any non-Undead Champion.
::: For Undead units and champions only

GameItemType.Description: Shadow Drakes have very quick reflexes.

GameModifier.Provides: Shadow Drakes have very quick reflexes.
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies
::: Can't be bought in the shop

GameItemType.Description: Stalkers are vicious beasts that will devastate other beasts.

GameModifier.Provides: Stalkers are vicious beasts that will devastate other beasts.
::: +20 Accuracy vs Beasts ::: Unless Rider is a Beast

GameItemType.Description: Hergons can be tamed by the Lizardmen - although only the females will allow riders on their back. Their large heads make them ideal for avoiding barrages of arrows.

GameModifier.Provides: Hergons can be tamed by the Lizardmen - although only the females will allow riders on their back. Their large heads make them ideal for avoiding barrages of arrows.
::: Trample ::: ::: Normal ATK ::: Moves target back 1 tile ::: Move up 2 tiles if target dies

GameItemType.Description: Reliquary item #47. This is a Shrill Lord that has been completely broken by the use of some magical spell. Everything that was the Shrill Lord's conscious mind has been completely replaced. There is no known spell that can accomplish something with such devastating results. The spell has turned what used to be one of the deadliest creatures known to this world into a docile mount. It appears to survive by consuming the magical energies in the air around it. When not in use, the Shrill Lord will roll up in a ball and maintain only a minimal heartbeat to conserve energy. Because of this, the Shrill Lord could theoretically be left in storage for years on end without suffering any damage. The exoskeleton of the Shrill Lord helps to protect its rider from cutting damage.
